DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to establish, through ultrasound, measurements of the thigh muscles (Biceps Femoris and Vastus Lateralis)and the chronic effects of a static stretching program on the muscle-tendon unit these muscles.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of Thigh Muscle After a Stretching Program
DOC.criteria: physically active male volunteers soldiers of the Army School of Physical Education of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil young men any musculoskeletal disorder in the lower limbs neurological or cardiovascular disease experienced previous to or reported during the study.
